description: It’s the biggest opening stand in ODIs not just for women but even for men. India scored 358/2 and Ireland, in reply, were all out for 109 in 40 overs, handing India’s women their biggest victory in terms of runs in ODIs.
title: Indian women in record 320-run stand - Times of India

description: The range and scope of the plan is breathtaking, showing a deep penetration into Pakistan’s economic life. This could have several implications for India – Pakistan’s sovereignty could be forfeited to Chinese interests and China would be uncomfortably close to India’s borders in the east and west.
title: Beijing plans to turn Pakistan into its economic colony - Times of India

description: Pakistan on Monday while presenting its case at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Kulbhushan Jadhav issue claimed that "India has used this court as the scene of political theatre."
title: At ICJ, Pakistan says India's application on Kulbhushan Jadhav is unnecessary, misconceived - Times of India

author: Annesha Ghosh
description: India's record-breaking openers, Deepti Sharma and Poonam Raut, each showcased their own style and story against Ireland: one highlighting exciting potential and the other, a tenacity and sense of abandon
title: Precocity, perseverance and a record stand
